title: Needed Nutrients
author: Sonja Swenson; Public Health Education Intern Palo Alto Medical Foundation
description: What are the main nutrients and why do you need them
cleaned_text: Do you get all the nutrients you need? Many young people don't. By educating yourself and paying attention to what you eat, you'll develop nutritious habits for a lifetime. Even small changes can have a huge impact on the way you feel now and in the long run. A healthy diet should be balanced. That means getting enough of the three main nutrients — carbohydrates, healthy fats and protein — every day and not eating too little or too much.
